head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCCOLLUM, TIMOTHY R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCCOLLUM, TIMOTHY R.

block.p: McCOLLUM-Timothy R. age 41, of Morristown, NJ on Tuesday, July 4, 2000. Beloved husband of Cindy McCollum, devoted father of Morgan, Cole and Clayton, ages 8, 5 and 3 respectively, beloved brother of Dan of Bridgewater, NJ, and John of Far Hills, NJ, sonin-law of Deanna and Barry Lichtenstein of Bridgewater, NJ. A memorial service will be held Friday, July 7 at 12Noon at Bretton Woods, 361 Speedwell Ave., Morris Plains, NJ. Entombment at Somerset Hills Memorial Park, Basking Ridge, NJ. Memorial gifts may be made to the Tim McCollum Memorial Fund at the American Brain Tumor Association, 2720 River Rd., Suite 146, Des Plaines, IL 60018. For further information contact Bailey Funeral Home, Inc. 8 Hilltop Road, Mendham, New Jersey (973-543-4720)
